Congratulations! You have successfully managed to fill the square, however, you didn\'t achieve a high score this time. What would you like to do next?

Version 1.0

You will initially be presented with a grid which will be filled with tiles of random colours. The aim of the game is to fill the grid one solid colour. To do this you will need to press on different coloured tiles, this in turn, will fill each neighbour square that are the same colour the colour you selected until a square is reached that is a different colour then this process will stop. You will have a set number of moves in order to fill the square the single solid colour
